amendment.description: Amendment as originally offered, ensures an acquisition strategy that will field a UH-1N (Huey helicoptors) replacement strategy. As modified, the amendment requires that such a replacement strategy would be under contract in FY 2018.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 60 printed in House Report 114-569 to ensure the security of our land-based nuclear forces and ensures an acquisition strategy that will field a UH 1N replacement aircraft in fiscal year 2018. The modification adds a new section titled Requests for Forces to Meet Security Requirements for Land-Based Nuclear Forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Zinke amendment (A017) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Zinke amendment (A017) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Zinke.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Zinke amendment (A017) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
